Text.val: 06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
If PI.MARKCODESPEC = blank then use 46 as default

ExpSyntax.val: 'DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO = '&Str ({0,3},'4')&' and DEBC.DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC = '&Str ({0,4},'3')&' and DEBC.DEBC_DATDELETED is null'
Trim ({0,2})&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Credit limit date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Finance limit')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Finance limit date')

Trim ({0,2})&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtor number legal owner')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtor country')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtor address')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Reference limit')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Reference limit date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Credit limit')

MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtornumber ING')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtornumber Client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Administration number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtor name 1')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor.Debtor name 2')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC.DEBC_DEBH, DEBC.DEBC_DEBC, DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC.DEBC_NAME, DEBC.DEBC_COUNTRY, DEBC.DEBC_ADDRESS, DEBC.DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC.DEBC_CLCURR, DEBC.DEBC_CREDITLIMITDATE, DEBC.DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, DEBC.DEBC_FINANCELIMITCURR, DEBC.DEBC_FINANCELIMITDATE from :1 where :2 order by DEBC.DEBC_DEBH, DEBC.DEBC_DEBC for fetch only
